original_text: And I will establish my covenant with you, neither shall all flesh be cut off any more by the waters of a flood; neither shall there any more be a flood to destroy the earth.
korean_text: 내가 너희와 언약을 세우리니 다시는 모든 생물을 홍수로 멸하지 아니할 것이라 땅을 멸할 홍수가 다시 있지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: And I will establish my covenant with you
neither shall all flesh be cut off any more
sentences.korean_translation: 다시는 모든 육체가 끊어지지 아니할 것이며

sentences.original_text: by the waters of a flood
neither shall there any more be a flood
